src_original: athāvatīryāśvarathadvipebhyaḥ śākyā yathāsvarddhi gṛhītaveṣāḥ /
tgt_original: athāvatīryāśvarathadvipebhyaḥ śākyā yathāsvarddhigṛhītaveṣāḥ |

src_original: mahāpaṇebhyo vyavahāriṇaś ca mahāmunau bhaktivaśāt praṇemuḥ // Saund_5.1 //
tgt_original: mahāpaṇebhyo vyavahāriṇaśca mahāmunau bhaktivaśāt praṇemuḥ ||1 ||

src_original: ke cit praṇamyānuyayur mhūrtaṅ ke cit praṇamyārthavaśena jagmuḥ /
tgt_original: kecit praṇamyānuyayurmuhūrttaṃ kecit praṇamyārthavaśena jagmuḥ |

src_original: ke cit svakeṣv āvastheṣu tastuḥ kṛtvāñjalīn vikṣaṇatatparākṣāḥ // Saund_5.2 //
tgt_original: kecit svakeṣvāvasatheṣu tasthuḥ kṛtvāñjalīn vīkṣaṇatatparākṣāḥ ||2 ||

src_original: buddhas tatas tatra narendramārga sroto mahadbhaktimato janasya /
tgt_original: buddhastatastatra narendramārge sroto mahadbhaktimato janasya |

src_original: jagāma duūkhena vigāhamāno jalāgame srota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_5.3 //
tgt_original: jagāma duḥkhena vigāhamāno jalāgame strota ivāpagāyāḥ ||3 ||

src_original: atho mahadbhiḥ pathi saṃpatadbhiḥ saṃpūjyamānāya tathāgatāya /
tgt_original: atho mahadbhiḥ pati saṃpatadbhiḥ saṃpūjyamānāya tathāgatāya |

src_original: kartuṃ prañāmaṃ na śaśāka nandas tenābhireme tu guror mahimnā // Saund_5.4 //
tgt_original: karttuṃ praṇāmaṃ na śaśāka nandastenābhireme tu gurormahimnā ||4 ||

src_original: svaṃ cāvasaṅgaṃ pathi nirmumukṣur bhaktiṃ janasyānyamateś ca rakṣan /  nandaṃ ca gehābhimukhaṃ jighṛkṣan mārgaṃ tato 'nyaṃ sugataḥ prapede // Saund_5.5 //
tgt_original: svaṃ cāvasaṅgaṃ pathi nirmumukṣurbhaktiṃ janasyānyamateśva rakṣan |  nandaṃ ca gehābhimukhaṃ jighṛkṣan mārgaṃ tato'nyaṃ sugataḥ prapede ||5 ||

src_original: tato viviktaṃ ca viviktacetāḥ sanmārgavin mārgam abhipratasthe /
tgt_original: tato viviktaṃ ca viviktacetāḥ sanmārgavin mārgamabhipratasthe |

src_original: gatvāgrataś cāgryatamāya tasmai nāndīvimuktāya nanāma nadnaḥ // Saund_5.6 //  śanair vrjann eva sa gauraveṇa paṭāvṛtāṃso vinatārdhakāyaḥ /
tgt_original: gatvāgrataścāgryatamāya tasmai nāndīvimuktāya nanāma nandaḥ ||6 ||  śanairvrajanneva sa gauraveṇa paṭāvṛtāṃso vinatārdhakāyaḥ |

src_original: adhonibaddhāñjalir ūrdhvanetraḥ sagadgadaṃ vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe // Saund_5.7 //
tgt_original: adhonibaddhāñjalirūrdhvanetraḥ sagadgadaṃ vākyamidaṃ babhāṣe ||7 ||

src_original: prāsādasaṃstho bhavantam antaḥpraviṣṭam aśrauṣam anugrahāya /
tgt_original: prāsādasaṃstho bhagavantamantaḥpraviṣṭamaśrauṣamanugrahāya |

src_original: atas tvarāvān aham abhyupeto gṛhasya kakṣyāmahato 'bhasūyan // Saund_5.8 //  tat sādhu sādhupriya matpriyārthaṃ tatrāstu bikṣūttama bhaikṣakālsaḥ /
tgt_original: atastvarāvānahamabhyupeto gṛhasya kakṣyāmahato'bhyasūyan ||8 ||  tatsādhu sāhupriya mattpriyārtham tatrāstu bhikṣūttama bhaikṣakālaḥ |

src_original: asau hi madhyaṃ nabhaso yiyāsuḥ kālaṃ pratismārayatīva sūryaḥ // Saund_5.9 //
tgt_original: asau hi madhyaṃ nabhaso yiyāsuḥ kālaṃ pratismārayatīva sūryaḥ ||9 ||

src_original: ity evam uktaḥ praṇatena tena snehābhimānonmukhalocanena /  tādṛṅnimittaṃ sugataś cakāra nāhārakṛtyaṃ sa yathā viveda // Saund_5.10 //
tgt_original: ityevamuktaḥ praṇatena tena snehābhimānonmukhalocanena |  tādṛṅ nimittaṃ sugataścakāra nāhārakṛtyaṃ sa yathā viveda ||10 ||

src_original: tataḥ sa kṛtvā munaye praṇāmaṃ gṛhaprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra /
tgt_original: tataḥ sa kṛtvā munaye praṇāmaṃ gṛhaprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra |

src_original: anugrahārthaṃ sugatas tu tasmai pātraṃ dadau puṣkarapattranetraḥ // Saund_5.11 //
tgt_original: anugrahārthaṃ sugatastu tasmai pātraṃ dadau puraṣkarapatranetraḥ ||11 ||

src_original: tataḥ sa loke dadataḥ phalārthaṃ pātrasya tasyāpratimasya pātram /
tgt_original: tataḥ sa loke dadataḥ phalārthaṃ pātrasya tasyāpratimasya pātram |

src_original: jagrāha cāpagrahaṇakṣaṃābhyāṃ padmopamābhyāṃ prayataḥ karābhyām // Saund_5.12 //
tgt_original: jagrāha cāpagrahaṇakṣamābhyāṃ padmopamābhyāṃ prayataḥ karābhyām ||12 ||

src_original: parāṅmukhas tv anyamanaskam ārād vijñāya nandaḥ sugataṃ gatāstham /
tgt_original: parāṅmukhantvanyamanaskamārād vijñāya nandaḥ sugataṃ gatāstham |

src_original: hastasthapātro 'pi gṛha yiyāsuḥ sasāra mārgān munim īkṣamāṇaḥ // Saund_5.13 //  bhāryānurāgeṇa yadā gṛhaṃ sa pātraṃ gṛhītvāpi yiyāsur eva /
tgt_original: hastasthapātro'pi gṛhaṃ yiyāsuḥ sasāra mārgānmunimīkṣamāṇaḥ ||13 ||  bhāryānurāgeṇa yadā gṛhaṃ sa pātraṃ gṛhītvā'pi yiyāsureva |

src_original: vimohayām āsa munis tatas taṃ rathyāmukhasyāvaraṇena tasya // Saund_5.14 //
tgt_original: vimohayāmāsa munistatastaṃ rathyāmukhasyāvaraṇena tasya ||14 ||

src_original: nirmokṣabījaṃ hi dadarśa tasya jñanaṃ mṛdu kleśarajaś ca tīvram /
tgt_original: nirmokṣabījaṃ hi dadarśa tasya jñānaṃ mṛdu kleśarajaśca tīvram |

src_original: kleśānukūlaṃ viṣayātmakaṅ ca nandaṃ yatas taṃ munir ācakarṣa // Saund_5.15 //
tgt_original: kleśānukūlaṃ viṣayātmakaṃ ca nandaṃ yatastaṃ munirācakarṣa ||15 ||

src_original: saṃkleśapakṣo dvividhaś ca dṛṣṭas tathā dvikalpo vyavadānapakṣaḥ /
tgt_original: saṃkleśapakṣo dvividhaśca dṛṣṭastathā dvikalpo vyavadānapakṣaḥ |

src_original: ātmāśrayo hetubalādhikasya bāhyāśrayaḥ pratyayagauravasya // Saund_5.16 //
tgt_original: ātmāśrayo hetubalādhikasya bāhyāśrayaḥ pratyayagauravasya ||16 ||

src_original: ayatnato hetubalādhikas tu nirmucyate ghaṭṭitamātra eva /
tgt_original: ayatnato hetubalādhikastu nirmucyate ghaṭṭitamātra eva |

src_original: yatnena tu pratyayaneyabuddhir vimokṣam āpnoti parāśrayeṇa // Saund_5.17 //
tgt_original: yatnena tu pratyayaneyabuddhirvimokṣamāpnoti parāśrayeṇa ||17 ||

src_original: nandaḥ sa ca pratyayaneyacetā yaṃ śiśriye tanmayatām avāpa /
tgt_original: nandaḥ sa ca pratyayaneyacetā yaṃ śiśriye tanmayatāmavāpa |

src_original: yasmād imaṃ tatra cakāra yatnaṃ taṃ snehapaṅkān munir ujjihīrṣam // Saund_5.18 //
tgt_original: yasmādimaṃ tatra cakāra yannaṃ taṃ snehapaṅkān munirujjihīrṣan ||18 ||

src_original: nandas tu duḥkhena viceṣṭamānaḥ śanair agatyā gurum anvagacchat /
tgt_original: nandastu duḥkhena viceṣṭamānaḥ śanairagatyā gurumanvagacchat |

src_original: bhāryāmukhaṃ vīkṣaṇalolanetraṃ vicintayann ādraviśeṣakaṃ tat // Saund_5.19 //
tgt_original: bhāryāmukhaṃ vīkṣaṇalolanetraṃ vicintayannārdraviśeṣakaṃ tat ||19 ||

src_original: tato munis taṃ priyamālyahāraṃ vasantamāsena kṛtābhihāram /  nināya bhagnapramadāvihāraṃ vidyāvihārābhimataṃ vihāram // Saund_5.20 //
tgt_original: tato munistaṃ priyamālyahāraṃ vasantamāsena kṛtābhihāram |  nināya bhagnapramadāvihāraṃ vidyāvihārābhimataṃ vihāram ||20 ||

src_original: dīnaṃ mahākāruṇikas tatas taṃ dṛṣṭvā muhūrtaṃ karuṇāyamānaḥ /  kareṇa cakdrāṅkatalena mūrdhni pasparśa caivedam uvāca cainam // Saund_5.21 //
tgt_original: dīnaṃ mahākāruṇikastatastaṃ dṛṣṭvā muhūrta karuṇāyamānaḥ |  kareṇa cakrāṅkatalena mūrdhni pasparśa caivedamuvāca cainam ||21 ||

src_original: yāvan na hiṃsraḥ samupaiti kālaḥ śamāya tāvat kuru saumya buddhim /
tgt_original: yāvanna hiṃsraḥ samupaiti kālaḥ śamāya tāvat kuru saumya buddhim |

src_original: sarvāsv avasthāsv iha vartamānaḥ sarvābhisāreṇa nihanti mṛtyuḥ // Saund_5.22 //
tgt_original: sarvāsvavasthāsviha vartamānaṃ sarvābhisāreṇa nihanti mṛtyuḥ ||22 ||

src_original: sādhāraṇāt svapnanibhādasārāl lolaṃ manaḥ kāmasukhān niyaccha /
tgt_original: sādhāraṇāt svapnanibhādasārāllolaṃ manaḥ kāmasukhānniyaccha |

src_original: havyair ivāgneḥ pavaneritasya lokasya kāmair na hi tṛptir asti // Saund_5.23 //
tgt_original: havyairivāgneḥ pavaneritasya lokasya kāmairna hi tṛptirasti ||23 ||

src_original: śraddhādhanaṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ dhanebhyaḥ prajñārasas tṛptir rasebhyaḥ /
tgt_original: śraddhādhanaṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ dhanebhyaḥ prajñārasasṛptikaro rasebhyaḥ |

src_original: pradhānamadhyātmasukhaṃ sukhebhyo vidyāratir duḥkhatatmā ratibhyaḥ // Saund_5.24 //
tgt_original: pradhānamadhyātmasukhaṃ sukhebhyo'vidyāratirduḥkhatamāratibhyaḥ ||24 ||

src_original: hitasya vaktā pravaraḥ suṛdbhyo dharmāya khedo guṇavān śramebhyaḥ /
tgt_original: hitasya vaktā pravaraḥ suhṛdbhyo dharmāya khedo guṇavān śramebhyaḥ |

src_original: jñānāya kṛtyaṃ paramaṃ kriyābhyaḥ kim indriyāṇām upagamya dāsyam // Saund_5.25 //
tgt_original: jñānāya kṛtyaṃ paramaṃ kriyābhyaḥ kimindriyāṇāmupagamya dāsyam ||25 ||

src_original: tan niścitaṃ bhīklamaśugviyuktaṃ pareṣv anāyattam ahāryam anyaiḥ /
tgt_original: tanniścitaṃ bhīlkamaśugviyuktaṃ pareṣvanāyattamahāryamanyaiḥ |

src_original: nityaṃ śivaṃ śāntisukhaṃ vṛṇīṣva kim indriyārthārtham anartham ūḍhvā // Saund_5.26 //
tgt_original: nityaṃ śivaṃ śāntisukhaṃ vṛṇīṣva kimindriyārthārthamanarthamūḍhvā ||26 ||

src_original: jarāsamā nāsty amṛjā prajānāṃ vyādheḥ samo nāsti jagaty anarthaḥ /
tgt_original: jarāsamā nāstyamṛjā prajānāṃ vyādheḥ samo nāsti jagatyanarthaḥ |

src_original: mṛtyoḥ samaṃ nāsti bhayaṃ pṛthivyām etat trayaṃ khalv avaśena sevyam // Saund_5.27 //
tgt_original: mṛtyoḥ samaṃ nāsti bhayaṃ pṛthivyāmetattrayaṃ khalvavaśena sevyam ||27 ||

src_original: snehena kaś cin na samo 'sti pāśaḥ sroto na tṛṇāsamam asti hāri /  rāgāgninā nāsti samas tathāgnis tac cet trayaṃ nāsti sukhaṃ ca te 'sti // Saund_5.28 //
tgt_original: rāgāgninā nāsti samastathāgnistaccet trayaṃ nāsti sukhaṃ ca te'sti ||28 ||

src_original: avaśyabhāvi priyaviprayogas tasmāc ca śoko niyataṃ viṣevyaḥ /
tgt_original: avaśyabhāvī priyaviprayogastasmāñca śoko niyataṃ niṣevyaḥ |

src_original: śokena conmādam upeyivāṃso rājarṣayo 'nye 'py avaśā viceluḥ // Saund_5.29 //
tgt_original: śokena conmādamupeyivāṃso rājarṣayo'nye'pyavaśā vicelu ||29 ||

src_original: prajñāmayaṃ varma badhāna tasmān no kṣāntinighnasya hi śokabāṇāḥ /
tgt_original: prajñāmayaṃ varma badhāna tasmānno kṣāntinighnasya hi śokabāṇāḥ |

src_original: mahac ca dagdhuṃ bhavakakṣajālaṃ saṃdhukṣayālpāgnim ivātmatejaḥ // Saund_5.30 //
tgt_original: mahacca dagdhuṃ bhavakakṣajālaṃ saṃghukṣayālpāgnimivātmatejaḥ ||30 ||

src_original: yathauṣadhair hastagataiḥ savidyo na daśyate kaś cana pannagena /
tgt_original: yathauṣadhairhastagataiḥ savidyo na daśyate kaścana pannagena |

src_original: tathānapekṣo jitalokamoho na daśyate śokabhujaṅgamena // Saund_5.31 //
tgt_original: tathānapekṣo jitalokamoho na daśyate śokabhujaṃgamena ||31 ||

src_original: āsthāya yogaṃ parigamya tattvaṃ na trāsam āgacchati mṛtyukāle /
tgt_original: āsthāya yogaṃ parigamya tattvaṃ na trāsamāgacchati mṛtyukāle |

src_original: ābaddhavarmā sudhanuḥ kṛtāstro jigīṣayā śūra ivāhavasthaḥ // Saund_5.32 //
tgt_original: ābaddhavarmā sudhanuḥ kṛtāsro jigīṣayā śūra ivāhavasthaḥ ||32 ||

src_original: ity evam uktaḥ sa tathāgatena sarveṣu bhūteṣv anukampakena /
tgt_original: ityevamuktaḥ sa tathāgatena sarveṣu bhūteṣvanukampakena |

src_original: dhṛṣṭaṃ girāntarhṛdayena sīdaṃs tatheti nandaḥ sugataṃ babhāṣe // Saund_5.33 //
tgt_original: dhṛṣṭaṃ girāntarhṛdayena sīdaṃstatheti nandaḥ sugataṃ babhāṣe ||33 ||

src_original: atha pramādāc ca tam ujjihīrṣan matvāgamasyaiva ca pātrabhūtam /
tgt_original: atha pramādācca tamujjihīrṣan matvāgamasyaiva ca pātrabhūtam |

src_original: pravrājayānanda śamāya nandam ity abravīn maitramanā maharṣiḥ // Saund_5.34 //  nandaṃ tato 'ntarmanasā rudantam ehīti vaidehamunir jagāda /  śanais tatas taṃ samupetya nando na pravrajiṣyāmy aham ity uvāca // Saund_5.35 //
tgt_original: prabrājayānanda śamāya nandamityabravīnmaitramanā maharṣiḥ ||34 ||  nandaṃ tato'ntarmanasā rudantamehīti vaidehamunirjagāda |  śanaistatastaṃ samupetya nando na pravrajiṣyāmyahamityuvāca ||35 ||

src_original: śrutvātha nandasya manīṣitaṃ tad buddhāya vaidehamuniḥ śaśaṃsa /
tgt_original: śrutvātha nandasya manīṣitaṃ tad buddhāya vaidehamuniḥ śaśaṃsa |

src_original: saṃśrutya tasmād api tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunir nandam uvāca bhūyaḥ // Saund_5.36 //  mayy agraje pravrajite 'jitātman bhrātṣṛv anupravrajiteṣu cāsmān /  jñātīṃś tasmād api tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunir nandam uvāca bhūyaḥ // Saund_5.37 //
tgt_original: saṃśrutya tasmādapi tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunirnandamuvāca bhūyaḥ ||36 ||  mayyagraje pravrajite'jitātman bhrātṛṣvanupravrajiteṣu cāsmān |  jñātīṃśca dṛṣṭvā vratino gṛhasthān saṃvinna kiṃ te'sti na vāsti cetaḥ ||37 ||

src_original: rājarṣayas te viditā na nūnaṃ vanāni ye śiśriyire hasantaḥ /
tgt_original: rājarṣayaste viditā na nūnaṃ vanāni ye śiśriyire hasantaḥ |

src_original: niṣṭhīvya kāmān upaśāntikāmāḥ kāmeṣu naivaṃ kṛpaṇeṣu saktāḥ // Saund_5.38 //
tgt_original: niṣṭhīvya kāmānupaśāntikāmāḥ kāmeṣu naivaṃ kṛpaṇeṣu saktāḥ ||38 ||

src_original: bhūyaḥ samālokya gṛheṣu doṣān niśāmya tattyāgakṛtaṃ ca śarma /
tgt_original: bhūyaḥ samālokya gṛheṣu doṣān niśāmya tattyāgakṛtaṃ ca śarma |

src_original: naivāsti moktuṃ maitrālayaṃ te deśaṃ mumūrṣor iva sopasargam // Saund_5.39 //  saṃsārakāntāraparāyaṇasya śive kathaṃ te pathi nārurukṣā /  āropyamāṇasya tam eva mārgaṃ bhraṣṭasya sārthād iva sārthikasya // Saund_5.40 //
tgt_original: naivāsti moktuṃ matirālayaṃ te deśaṃ mumūrṣoriva sopasargam ||39 ||  saṃsārakāntāraparāyaṇasya śive kathaṃ te pathi nārurukṣā |  āropyamāṇasya tameva mārgaṃ bhraṣṭasya sārthādiva sārthikasya ||40 ||

src_original: yaḥ sarvato veśmani dahyamāne śayita mohān na tato vyapeyāt /  kālāgninā vyādhijarāśikhena loke pradīpte sa bhavet pramattaḥ // Saund_5.41 //
tgt_original: yaḥ sarvato veśmani dahyamāne śayīta mohānna tato vyapeyāt |  kālāgninā vyādhijarāśikhena loke pradīpte sa bhavet pramattaḥ ||41 ||

src_original: prañīyamānaś ca yathā vadhāya matto hasec ca pralapec ca vadhyaḥ /  mṛtyau tathā tiṣṭhati pāśahaste śocyaḥ pramādyan viparītacetāḥ // Saund_5.42 //
tgt_original: praṇīyamānaśca yathā vadhāya matto hasecca pralapecca vadhyaḥ |  mṛtyau tathā tiṣṭhati pāśahaste śocyaḥ pramādyan viparitacetāḥ ||42 ||

src_original: yadā narendrāś ca kuṭumbinaś ca vihāya badhūṃś ca parigrahāṃś ca /
tgt_original: yadā narendrāśca kuṭumbinaśca vihāya bandhūṃśca parigrahāṃśca |

src_original: yayuś ca yāsyanti ca yānti caiva priyeṣv anityeṣv kuto 'nurodhaḥ // Saund_5.43 //
tgt_original: yayuśca yāsyanti ca yānti caiva priyeṣvanityeṣu kuto'nurodhaḥ ||43 ||

src_original: kiṃ cin na paśyāmi ratasya yatra tad anyabhāvena bhaven na duḥkham /
tgt_original: kiñcinna paśyāmi ratasya yatra tadanyabhāvena bhavenna duḥkham |

src_original: tasmāt kva cin na kṣamate prasktir yadi kṣamas tadvigamān na śokaḥ // Saund_5.44 //
tgt_original: tasmāt kvacinna kṣamate prasaktiryadi kṣamastadvigamānna śokaḥ ||44 ||

src_original: tat saumya lolaṃ parigamya lokaṃ māyopamaṃ citram ivendrajālam /
tgt_original: tatsaumya lolaṃ parigamya lokaṃ māyopamaṃ citramivendrajālam |

src_original: priyābhidhāntaṃ tayja mohajālaṃ chettuṃ matis te yadi duḥkhajālam // Saund_5.45 //
tgt_original: priyābhidhānaṃ tyaja mohajālaṃ chettuṃ matiste yadi duḥkhajālam ||45 ||

src_original: varaṃ hitodarkam aniṣṭam annaṃ na svādu yat syād ahitānubaddham /
tgt_original: varaṃ hitodarkamāniṣṭamannaṃ na svādu yat syādahitānubaddham |

src_original: yasmād ahaṃ tvā viniyojayāmi śive śucau vartmani vipriye 'pi // Saund_5.46 //
tgt_original: yasmādahaṃ tvāṃ viniyojayāmi śive śucau vartmani vipriye'pi ||46 ||

src_original: bālasya dhārtrī vinigṛhya loṣṭaṃ yathoddharaty āsyapuṭapraviṣṭam /  tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tat tvām avocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya // Saund_5.47 //
tgt_original: bālasya dhātrī vinigṛhya loṣṭhaṃ yathoddharatyāsyapuṭapraviṣṭam |  tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tattvāmavocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya ||47 ||

src_original: aniṣṭam apy auṣadham āturāya dadāti vaidyaś ca yathā nigṛhya /  tadvan mayoktaṃ pratikūlam etat tubhyaṃ hitodarkam anugrahāya // Saund_5.48 //
tgt_original: aniṣṭamapyauṣadhamāturāya dadāti vaidyaśca yathā nigṛhya |  tadvanmayoktaṃ pratikūlametattubhyaṃ hitodarkamanugrahāya ||48 ||

src_original: tad yāvad eva kṣañasaṃnipāto na mṛtyur āgacchati yāvad eva /
tgt_original: tadyāvadeva kṣaṇasaṃnipāto na mṛtyurāgacchati yāvadeva |

src_original: yāvad vayo yogavidhau samarthaṃ buddhiṃ kuru śreyasi tāvad eva // Saund_5.49 //
tgt_original: yāvadvayo yogavidhau samarthaṃ buddhiṃ kuru śreyasi tāvadeva ||49 ||

src_original: ity evam uktaḥ sa vināyakena hitaiṣinā kāruṇikena nandaḥ /
tgt_original: ityevamuktaḥ sa vināyakena hitaiṣiṇā kāruṇikena nandaḥ |

src_original: kartāsmi sarvaṃ bhagavan vacas te tathā yathājñāpaysīty uvāca // Saund_5.50 //
tgt_original: kartāsmi sarvaṃ bhagavan vacaste tathā yathājñāpayasītyuvāca ||50 ||

src_original: ādāya vaidehamunis tatas taṃ nināya saṃśliṣya viceṣṭamānam /
tgt_original: ādāya vaidehamunistatastaṃ nināya saṃśliṣya viceṣṭamānam |

src_original: vyayojayac cāsrupariplutākṣaṃ keśaśriyaṃ chattranibhasya mūrdhnaḥ // Saund_5.51 //
tgt_original: vyayojayaccāśrupariplutākṣaṃ keśaśriyaṃ chatranibhasya mūrdhnaḥ ||51 ||

src_original: atho nataṃ tasya mukhaṃ sabāṣpaṃ pravāsyamāneṣu śiroruheṣu /
tgt_original: atho nataṃ tasya mukhaṃ sabāṣpaṃ pravāsyamāneṣu śiroruheṣu |

src_original: vakrāgranālaṃ nalinaṃ taḍāge varṣodakalinnam ivābabhāse // Saund_5.52 //  nandas tatas tarukaṣāyaviraktavāsāś cintāvaśo navagṛhita iva dvipendraḥ /  pūrṇaḥ śaśī bahulapakṣagataḥ kṣapānte bālātpena pariṣikta ivābabhāse // Saund_5.53 //
tgt_original: vakrāgranālaṃ nalinaṃ taḍāge varṣodakaklinnamivābabhāse ||52 ||  nandastatastarukaṣāyaviraktavāsāścintāvaśo navagṛhīta iva dvipendraḥ |  pūrṇaḥ śaśī bahulapakṣagataḥ kṣapānte bālātapena pariṣikta ivāvabhāse ||53 ||

src_original: Saundaranande mahākāvye nandapravrājano nāma pañcamaḥ sargaḥ /  CANTO VI
tgt_original: saundarananda kāvye “nanda-dīkṣā“ nāma pañcama sarga samāpta |  ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ  bhāryā-vilāpa
